name: Rhythm Battle
description: Jam to the rhythm while battling! Controls:  A/D move & attack J/K   attack ESC   pause/resume  The game is an early prototype and takes about one year of my free time to design/make.  More levels and social media channels are coming up！ If you like the game, follow it, leave a comment and make small donations. It will help me bring out more content faster.   Thanks for playing! : _)
